name: All Fucked Up
description:
Collect guns and ammo and shoot your god damn way to the next fv*king door! It's a prototype and I would love to get some feedback. That's it.

Some word of advise: Keep in mind it's a demo that provides a limited set of levels, no real ending, and bugs. No customization for key mappings at the time being. But if you ask politely I will provide you with a customized keymapping file.

Gamepad (nacon) uses the left joystick for movement, button 1 for jump, button 3 for shooting, and R2 for weapon switching.

Keyboard uses WASD for movement, space for jump, enter for shooting, and e for weapon switching. Keyboard has less fine-tuned movements and aiming capabilities.

Hit ESC to leave the game.
